protein.general_function: Involved in carbon-nitrogen ligase activity, with glutamine as amido-N-donor
protein.specific_function: Degrades bioactive fatty acid amides like oleamide, the endogenous cannabinoid, anandamide and myristic amide to their corresponding acids, thereby serving to terminate the signaling functions of these molecules. Hydrolyzes polyunsaturated substrate anandamide preferentially as compared to monounsaturated substrates.

go_class.description: carbon-nitrogen ligase activity, with glutamine as amido-n-donor
carbon-nitrogen ligase activity, with glutamine as amido-N-donor
